00291 
00292       string dName = "channel" + sChId;
00293 
00294       isubdir = d.find(dName);
00295 
00296       if ( isubdir == d.end()) { // if dir not found
00297          oc = new DrawObjContainer();
00298          oc->fDir = new TDirectoryFile(dName.c_str(), dName.c_str(), "", fDir);
00299       } else {
00300          oc = isubdir->second;
00301       }
00302 
00303       oc->fDir->cd();
00304 
00305       shName = "hIntensProfile_ch" + sChId;
00306       hist = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 1, 0, 1);
00307       hist->SetTitle("; Time, s; Events");
00308       hist->Sumw2();
00309       hist->SetOption("E1");
00310       oc->o[shName] = hist;
00311       fhIntensProfile_ch[iChId-1] = hist;
00312 
00313       shName = "hIntensProfileFine_ch" + sChId;
00314       hist = new TH1F(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 1, 0, 1);
00315       hist->SetTitle("; Time, s; Events");
00316       hist->Sumw2();
00317       hist->SetOption("E1");
00318       oc->o[shName] = hist;
00319       fhIntensProfileFine_ch[iChId-1] = hist;
00320 
00321       // If this is a new directory then we need to add it to the list
00322       if ( isubdir == d.end()) {
00323          d[dName] = oc;
00324       }
00325    }
00326 }

00330 void CnipolProfileHists::PreFill()
00331 {
00332    fhIntensProfile->SetBins(10*gNDelimeters, 0, gNDelimeters);
00333    fhIntensProfileFine->SetBins(100*gNDelimeters, 0, gNDelimeters);
00334    ((TH1*) o["hAsymVsDelim4Det"])->SetBins(10*gNDelimeters, 0, gNDelimeters);
00335 
00336    //((TH1*) o["hIntensProfileScaler"])->SetBins(nTgtIndex, 0, nTgtIndex);
00337    //fhPolarProfile->SetBins(nTgtIndex, 0, nTgtIndex);
00338    fhPolarProfile->SetBins(10*gNDelimeters, 0, gNDelimeters); // this is equivalent to hAsymVsDelim4Ch in asym
00339 
00340    for (int iChId=1; iChId<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iChId++)
00341    {
00342       fhIntensProfile_ch[iChId-1]->SetBins(10*gNDelimeters, 0, gNDelimeters);
00343       fhIntensProfileFine_ch[iChId-1]->SetBins(100*gNDelimeters, 0, gNDelimeters);
00344    }
00345 }

00349 void CnipolProfileHists::Fill(ChannelEvent *ch)
00350 {
00351    Double_t time = ((Double_t) ch->GetRevolutionId())/RHIC_REVOLUTION_FREQ;
00352    UChar_t  chId = ch->GetChannelId();
00353 
00354    //printf("time: %d, %d\n", time, ch->GetRevolutionId());
00355    //((TH2F*) sd->o["hSpinVsDelim_ch"+sSi])->Fill(ch->GetDelimiterId(), gSpinPattern[bId]);
00356    //((TH2F*) sd->o["hSpinVsDelim_ch"+sSi])->Fill(time, gSpinPattern[bId]);
00357 
00358    fhIntensProfile_ch[chId-1]->Fill(time);
00359    fhIntensProfileFine_ch[chId-1]->Fill(time);
00360 }

00362 
00364 void CnipolProfileHists::Fill(UInt_t n, int32_t* hData)
00365 {
00366    Double_t *hd    = new Double_t[n+3](); // 2+1 seems one bin is lost compared to PC_TARGET histograms
00367    Double_t *hdErr = new Double_t[n+3](); // 2+1 seems one bin is lost compared to PC_TARGET histograms
00368 
00369    //copy(hData, hData+1, hd);
00370    int32_t  *hPtr     = hData;
00371    Double_t *hdPtr    = hd;
00372    Double_t *hdErrPtr = hdErr;
00373    Double_t  nEntries = 0;
00374    //UInt_t    i = 0;
00375 
00376    hdPtr    += 2; // offset by 2: 1 underflow bin and 1 lost one
00377    hdErrPtr += 2; // offset by 2: 1 underflow bin and 1 lost one
00378 
00379    // Fill linear data and error arrays with proper dimensions, hd and hdErr
00380    while (hPtr != hData+n) {
00381       //printf("prof check i: %d, %d, %d\n", hPtr, hdPtr, hdErrPtr);
00382       *hdPtr++ = (Double_t) *hPtr++;
00383       *hdErrPtr++ = (*(hPtr-1) != 0 ? 1./TMath::Sqrt(*(hPtr-1)) : 0.);
00384       //cout << "prof check i: " << *(hPtr-1) << ", " << *(hdPtr-1) << ", " << *(hdErrPtr-1) << endl;
00385       //i++;
00386       nEntries += *(hPtr-1);
00387    }
00388 
00389    //for (UInt_t i=0; i<n+3; i++) {
00390    //   printf("prof check 2 i: %d, %ld, %f, %f\n", i, *(hData+i), *(hd+i), *(hdErr+i));
00391    //}
00392 
00393    ((TH1*) o["hIntensProfileScaler"])->SetBins(n+1, 0, n+1);
00394    ((TH1*) o["hIntensProfileScaler"])->SetContent(hd);
00395    ((TH1*) o["hIntensProfileScaler"])->SetError(hdErr);
00396    //((TH1*) o["hIntensProfileScaler"])->Sumw2();
00397    ((TH1*) o["hIntensProfileScaler"])->SetEntries(nEntries);
00398 
00399    delete [] hd;
00400    delete [] hdErr;
00401 }

00403 
00405 void CnipolProfileHists::FillDerived(DrawObjContainer &oc)
00406 {
00407    Info("FillDerived(DrawObjContainer &oc)", "Called");
00408 
00409    // Combine individual channel histograms
00410    for (int iChId=1; iChId<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iChId++)
00411    {
00412       fhIntensProfile->Add(fhIntensProfile_ch[iChId-1]);
00413       fhIntensProfileFine->Add(fhIntensProfileFine_ch[iChId-1]);
00414    }
00415 
00416    // Fill/transfer asym and polar vs time/delim histograms
00417    CnipolAsymHists *hists_asym = (CnipolAsymHists*) oc.d.find("asym")->second;
00418 
00419    if (!hists_asym) {
00420       Error("FillDerived(DrawObjContainer &oc)", "Histogram container \"asym\" not found. Skipping...");
00421       return;
00422    }
00423 
00424    TH1 *hAsymVsDelim4Det_asym = (TH1*) hists_asym->o["hAsymVsDelim4Det"];
00425    //TH1 *hAsymVsDelim4Ch_asym  = (TH1*) hists_asym->o["hAsymVsDelim4Ch"];
00426    TH1 *hAsymVsDelim4Det      = (TH1*) o["hAsymVsDelim4Det"];
00427 
00428    TGraphErrors *grAsymVsIntensProfile = (TGraphErrors*) fhAsymVsIntensProfile->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grAsymVsIntensProfile");
00429 
00430    Double_t maxCarbonRate = fhIntensProfile->GetMaximum();
00431 
00432    for (int ib=1; ib<=hAsymVsDelim4Det_asym->GetNbinsX(); ib++)
00433    {
00434       Double_t asym      = hAsymVsDelim4Det_asym->GetBinContent(ib);
00435       Double_t asymErr   = hAsymVsDelim4Det_asym->GetBinError(ib);
00436       Double_t intens    = fhIntensProfile->GetBinContent(ib)/maxCarbonRate;
00437       Double_t intensErr = fhIntensProfile->GetBinError(ib)/maxCarbonRate;
00438 
00439       hAsymVsDelim4Det->SetBinContent(ib, asym);
00440       hAsymVsDelim4Det->SetBinError(ib, asymErr);
00441 
00442       //asym    = hAsymVsDelim4Ch_asym->GetBinContent(ib);
00443       //asymErr = hAsymVsDelim4Ch_asym->GetBinError(ib);
00444 
00445       utils::AppendToGraph(grAsymVsIntensProfile, intens, asym, intensErr, asymErr);
00446 
00447       fhPolarProfile->SetBinContent(ib, asym/gAnaMeasResult->A_N[1]);
00448       fhPolarProfile->SetBinError(ib,   asymErr/gAnaMeasResult->A_N[1]);
00449    }
00450 }
00451 
00452 
00454 void CnipolProfileHists::PostFill()
00455 {
00456    Info("PostFill", "Called");
00457 
00458    //TH1* hIntensProfile = (TH1*) o["hIntensProfileScaler"];
00459    //TH1* hIntensProfile = (TH1*) o["hIntensProfile"];
00460 
00461    if (!fhIntensProfile->Integral()) {
00462       Error("PostFill", "Intensity profile histogram (hIntensProfile) is empty. Skipping...");
00463       return;
00464    }
00465 
00466    Double_t ymaxFine = fhIntensProfileFine->GetMaximum();
00467    fhIntensProfileFine->Scale(1./ymaxFine);
00468 
00469    Double_t ymax = fhIntensProfile->GetMaximum();
00470 
00471    fhIntensProfile->Scale(1./ymax);
00472    Double_t xmin = fhIntensProfile->GetXaxis()->GetXmin();
00473    Double_t xmax = fhIntensProfile->GetXaxis()->GetXmax();
00474    ymax = fhIntensProfile->GetMaximum();
00475 
00476    //TF1 profileFitFunc("ProfileFitFunc", CnipolProfileHists::ProfileFitFunc, xmin, xmax, 4);
00477    TF1 profileFitFunc("ProfileFitFunc", this, &CnipolProfileHists::ProfileFitFunc, xmin, xmax, 4, "CnipolProfileHists", "ProfileFitFunc");
00478 
00479    profileFitFunc.SetLineColor(kRed-3);
00480    profileFitFunc.SetParNames("#sigma", "#mu_{1}", "#mu_{2}", "N_{scale}");
00481    profileFitFunc.SetParameters(5, (xmax-xmin)*0.33, (xmax-xmin)*0.66, 1e6);
00482    profileFitFunc.SetParLimits(0, 0.5, 10);
00483    profileFitFunc.SetParLimits(1, (xmax-xmin)*0.1, (xmax-xmin)*0.4);
00484    profileFitFunc.SetParLimits(2, (xmax-xmin)*0.6, xmax*0.9);
00485    profileFitFunc.SetParLimits(3, ymax*0.5, ymax*1.5);
00486 
00487    TFitResultPtr fitres = fhIntensProfile->Fit(&profileFitFunc, "M S", "");
00488 
00489 
00490    TF1 profileTailFitFunc("ProfileTailFitFunc", this, &CnipolProfileHists::ProfileTailFitFunc, xmin, xmax, 4, "CnipolProfileHists", "ProfileTailFitFunc");
00491 
00492    profileTailFitFunc.SetLineColor(kGreen-3);
00493    profileTailFitFunc.SetParNames("#sigma", "#mu_{1}", "#mu_{2}", "N_{scale}");
00494    profileTailFitFunc.SetParameters(5, (xmax-xmin)*0.33, (xmax-xmin)*0.66, 1e6);
00495    profileTailFitFunc.SetParLimits(0, 0.5, 10);
00496    profileTailFitFunc.SetParLimits(1, (xmax-xmin)*0.1, (xmax-xmin)*0.4);
00497    profileTailFitFunc.SetParLimits(2, (xmax-xmin)*0.6, xmax*0.9);
00498    profileTailFitFunc.SetParLimits(3, ymax*0.5, ymax*3);
00499 
00500    fitres = fhIntensProfile->Fit(&profileTailFitFunc, "M S R +", "");
00501 
00502    // Now split the fhIntensProfile hist into two: forward and backward motions
00503    double sigma    = 0;
00504    double mean1    = 0;
00505    double mean2    = 0;
00506 
00507    if (fitres.Get()) {
00508       sigma    = fitres->Value(0);
00509       mean1    = fitres->Value(1);
00510       mean2    = fitres->Value(2);
00511    }
00512 
00513    TH1* hIntensProfileFwd  = (TH1*) o["hIntensProfileFwd"];
00514    TH1* hIntensProfileBck  = (TH1*) o["hIntensProfileBck"];
00515    TH1* hIntensProfileFold = (TH1*) o["hIntensProfileFold"];
00516    TH1* hPolarProfileFwd   = (TH1*) o["hPolarProfileFwd"];
00517    TH1* hPolarProfileBck   = (TH1*) o["hPolarProfileBck"];
00518    TH1* hPolarProfileFold  = (TH1*) o["hPolarProfileFold"];
00519    TH1* hPolarProfileFinal = (TH1*) o["hPolarProfileFinal"];
00520 
00521    if (!fhPolarProfile->Integral()) {
00522       Error("PostFill", "Polarization profile histogram (hPolarProfile) is empty. Skipping...");
00523       return;
00524    }
00525 
00526    Int_t bc  = fhIntensProfile->FindBin( mean1 + (mean2 - mean1)*0.5);
00527 
00528    Int_t bmean1 = fhIntensProfile->FindBin(mean1);
00529    Int_t bmean2 = fhIntensProfile->FindBin(mean2);
00530    Int_t bbegin = fhIntensProfile->FindBin(mean1-3*sigma);
00531    Int_t bend   = fhIntensProfile->FindBin(mean1+3*sigma);
00532 
00533    bbegin = bbegin >= 1 ? bbegin : 1;
00534    bend   = bend <= bc  ? bend : bc;
00535 
00536    //printf("bc, bmean1, bbegin, bend 1: %d, %d, %d, %d\n", bc, bmean1, bbegin, bend);
00537 
00538    hIntensProfileFwd ->SetBins(bend-bbegin+1, 0, bend-bbegin+1);
00539    hIntensProfileBck ->SetBins(bend-bbegin+1, 0, bend-bbegin+1);
00540    hIntensProfileFold->SetBins(bend-bbegin+1, 0, bend-bbegin+1);
00541    hPolarProfileFwd  ->SetBins(bend-bbegin+1, 0, bend-bbegin+1);
00542    hPolarProfileBck  ->SetBins(bend-bbegin+1, 0, bend-bbegin+1);
00543    hPolarProfileFold ->SetBins(bend-bbegin+1, 0, bend-bbegin+1);
00544    //hPolarProfileFinal->SetBins(bend-bbegin+1, 0, bend-bbegin+1);
00545 
00546    hPolarProfileFwd ->SetBit(TH1::kIsAverage);
00547    hPolarProfileBck ->SetBit(TH1::kIsAverage);
00548    hPolarProfileFold->SetBit(TH1::kIsAverage);
00549    //hPolarProfileFinal->SetBit(TH1::kIsAverage);
00550 
00551    hPolarProfileFwd ->Sumw2();
00552    hPolarProfileBck ->Sumw2();
00553    hPolarProfileFold->Sumw2();
00554    //hPolarProfileFinal->Sumw2();
00555 
00556    for (int i=bbegin, j=1; i<=bend; i++, j++)
00557    {
00558       hIntensProfileFwd->SetBinContent(j, fhIntensProfile->GetBinContent(i));
00559       hIntensProfileBck->SetBinContent(j, fhIntensProfile->GetBinContent(i + bmean2 - bmean1));
00560       //hIntensProfileFold->SetBinContent(j, fhIntensProfile->GetBinContent(i) + fhIntensProfile->GetBinContent(i + bmean2 - bmean1));
00561 
00562       hPolarProfileFwd->SetBinContent(j, fhPolarProfile->GetBinContent(i));
00563       hPolarProfileFwd->SetBinError  (j, fhPolarProfile->GetBinError(i));
00564       hPolarProfileBck->SetBinContent(j, fhPolarProfile->GetBinContent(i + bmean2 - bmean1));
00565       hPolarProfileBck->SetBinError  (j, fhPolarProfile->GetBinError(i + bmean2 - bmean1));
00566       //hPolarProfileFold->SetBinContent(j, fhPolarProfile->GetBinContent(i) + fhPolarProfile->GetBinContent(i + bmean2 - bmean1));
00567    }
00568 
00569    // Add forward and backward motions
00570    hPolarProfileFold->Add(hPolarProfileFwd, hPolarProfileBck);
00571    hPolarProfileFold->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(0, 1.05);
00572 
00573    //hPolarProfileFinal->Add(hPolarProfileFwd, hPolarProfileBck);
00574 
00575    Float_t maxDistance = FLT_MIN, minDistance = FLT_MAX;
00576    Float_t maxPol = FLT_MIN;
00577 
00578    TGraphErrors *grPolProfileFinal = new TGraphErrors();
00579    grPolProfileFinal->SetName("grPolProfileFinal");
00580    grPolProfileFinal->SetMarkerStyle(kFullDotLarge);
00581    grPolProfileFinal->SetMarkerSize(1);
00582    grPolProfileFinal->SetMarkerColor(kRed);
00583 
00584    //printf("\n%5s %5s %5s\n", "dist", "pol", "err");
00585 
00586    for (int i=bbegin, j=0; i<=bend; i++, j++)
00587    {
00588       Double_t pol     = hPolarProfileFold->GetBinContent(j+1);
00589       Double_t polErr  = hPolarProfileFold->GetBinError(j+1);
00590       Float_t distance = (tgt.all.x[i] - tgt.all.x[bmean1]) / 730.;
00591 
00592       if (distance > maxDistance) maxDistance = distance;
00593       if (distance < minDistance) minDistance = distance;
00594       if (pol > maxPol) maxPol = pol;
00595 
00596       //printf("%5.2f %5.2f %5.2f\n", distance, pol, polErr);
00597 
00598       grPolProfileFinal->SetPoint(j, distance, pol);
00599       grPolProfileFinal->SetPointError(j, 0, polErr);
00600    }
00601 
00602    //printf("minmax: %5.2f %5.2f %5.2f\n", maxPol, minDistance, maxDistance);
00603 
00604    grPolProfileFinal->Fit("gaus", "M E");
00605 
00606    hPolarProfileFinal->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grPolProfileFinal, "p");
00607    hPolarProfileFinal->GetXaxis()->SetLimits(minDistance*1.1, maxDistance*1.1);
00608    hPolarProfileFinal->GetYaxis()->SetLimits(0, maxPol*1.1);
00609    //hPolarProfileFinal->SetAxisRange(minDistance*1.1, maxDistance*1.1, "X");
00610    //hPolarProfileFinal->SetAxisRange(0, maxPol*1.1, "Y");
00611 
00612    //delete grPolProfileFinal;
00613 
00614    // Create graph polarization vs intensity
00615    TGraphErrors *grPolarVsIntensProfile = new TGraphErrors();
00616    grPolarVsIntensProfile->SetName("grPolarVsIntensProfile");
00617    grPolarVsIntensProfile->SetMarkerStyle(kFullDotLarge);
00618    grPolarVsIntensProfile->SetMarkerSize(1);
00619    grPolarVsIntensProfile->SetMarkerColor(kRed);
00620 
00621    for (int i=1; i<=fhIntensProfile->GetNbinsX(); i++)
00622    {
00623       float intens    = fhIntensProfile->GetBinContent(i);
00624       float intensErr = fhIntensProfile->GetBinError(i);
00625       float polar     = fhPolarProfile->GetBinContent(i);
00626       float polarErr  = fhPolarProfile->GetBinError(i);
00627 
00628       //printf("%5d %5d %5.2f %5.2f %5.2f\n", i, bmean, intens, polar, polarErr);
00629 
00630       grPolarVsIntensProfile->SetPoint(i, intens, polar);
00631       grPolarVsIntensProfile->SetPointError(i, intensErr, polarErr);
00632    }
00633 
00634    TF1 mfPow("mfPow", "[0]*TMath::Power(x, [1])", 0.1, 1);
00635 
00636    mfPow.SetParNames("P_{max}", "R");
00637    mfPow.SetParameters(0.5, 0.1);
00638    mfPow.SetParLimits(0, 0, 1);
00639    mfPow.SetParLimits(1, -2, 20);
00640 
00641    fitres = grPolarVsIntensProfile->Fit(&mfPow, "M E R S");
00642 
00643    if (fitres.Get()) {
00644       gAnaMeasResult->fFitResProfilePvsI = fitres;
00645 
00646       // the following should retire
00647       gAnaMeasResult->fProfilePolarMax = ValErrPair(fitres->Value(0), fitres->FitResult::Error(0));
00648       gAnaMeasResult->fProfilePolarR   = ValErrPair(fitres->Value(1), fitres->FitResult::Error(1));
00649 
00650    } else {
00651       Error("PostFill", "Something is wrong with profile fit");
00652    }
00653 
00654    mfPow.SetRange(0.1, 0.75);
00655    mfPow.SetLineColor(kOrange-1);
00656    fitres = grPolarVsIntensProfile->Fit(&mfPow, "M E R S +");
00657 
00658    if (fitres.Get()) gAnaMeasResult->fFitResProfilePvsIRange1 = fitres;
00659    else Error("PostFill", "Something is wrong with profile fit");
00660 
00661    mfPow.SetRange(0.80, 1);
00662    mfPow.SetLineColor(kOrange-3);
00663    fitres = grPolarVsIntensProfile->Fit(&mfPow, "M E R S +");
00664 
00665    if (fitres.Get()) gAnaMeasResult->fFitResProfilePvsIRange2 = fitres;
00666    else Error("PostFill", "Something is wrong with profile fit");
00667 
00668 
00669    TH1* hPolarVsIntensProfile = (TH1*) o["hPolarVsIntensProfile"];
00670    hPolarVsIntensProfile->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grPolarVsIntensProfile, "p");
00671 
00672    // Crazy new method
00673    TGraphErrors *grPolarUniProfile = new TGraphErrors();
00674    //TGraphErrors *grPolarUniProfile = (TGraphErrors*) o["grPolarUniProfile"];
00675    grPolarUniProfile->SetName("grPolarUniProfile");
00676    grPolarUniProfile->SetMarkerStyle(kFullDotLarge);
00677    grPolarUniProfile->SetMarkerSize(1);
00678    grPolarUniProfile->SetMarkerColor(kRed);
00679 
00680    TGraphErrors *grIntensUniProfile = new TGraphErrors();
00681    //TGraphErrors *grIntensUniProfile = (TGraphErrors*) o["grIntensUniProfile"];
00682    grIntensUniProfile->SetName("grIntensUniProfile");
00683    grIntensUniProfile->SetMarkerStyle(kFullDotLarge);
00684    grIntensUniProfile->SetMarkerSize(1);
00685    grIntensUniProfile->SetMarkerColor(kRed);
00686 
00687    for (int i=1; i<=fhIntensProfile->GetNbinsX(); i++)
00688    {
00689       float intens    = fhIntensProfile->GetBinContent(i);
00690 
00691       if (intens <= 0) continue;
00692 
00693       float intensErr = fhIntensProfile->GetBinError(i);
00694       float polar     = fhPolarProfile->GetBinContent(i);
00695       float polarErr  = fhPolarProfile->GetBinError(i);
00696 
00697 
00698       float xuni_p =    TMath::Sqrt(-2*TMath::Log(intens));
00699       float xuni_m = -1*TMath::Sqrt(-2*TMath::Log(intens));
00700 
00701       printf("%5d %5.2f %5.2f %5.2f %5.2f %5.2f %5.2f\n", i, intens, intensErr, polar, polarErr, xuni_p, xuni_m);
00702 
00703       grIntensUniProfile->SetPoint( (i-1)*2 + 0, xuni_p, intens);
00704       grIntensUniProfile->SetPoint( (i-1)*2 + 1, xuni_m, intens);
00705       grIntensUniProfile->SetPointError( (i-1)*2 + 0, 0, intensErr);
00706       grIntensUniProfile->SetPointError( (i-1)*2 + 1, 0, intensErr);
00707 
00708       grPolarUniProfile->SetPoint( (i-1)*2 + 0, xuni_p, polar);
00709       grPolarUniProfile->SetPoint( (i-1)*2 + 1, xuni_m, polar);
00710       grPolarUniProfile->SetPointError( (i-1)*2 + 0, 0, polarErr);
00711       grPolarUniProfile->SetPointError( (i-1)*2 + 1, 0, polarErr);
00712    }
00713 
00714    grIntensUniProfile->Fit("gaus", "M E");
00715 
00716    TH1* hIntensUniProfile = (TH1*) o["hIntensUniProfile"];
00717    hIntensUniProfile->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grIntensUniProfile, "p");
00718 
00719    grPolarUniProfile->Fit("gaus", "M E", "", -3, 3);
00720 
00721    TH1* hPolarUniProfile = (TH1*) o["hPolarUniProfile"];
00722    hPolarUniProfile->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grPolarUniProfile, "p");
00723 
00724 
00725    TH1 *hAsymVsDelim4Det = (TH1*) o["hAsymVsDelim4Det"];
00726    TH1 *hAsymUniProfile  = (TH1*) o["hAsymUniProfile"];
00727 
00728    TGraphErrors *grIntensUniProfileFineBin = (TGraphErrors*) hIntensUniProfile->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grIntensUniProfileFineBin");
00729    TGraphErrors *grAsymUniProfileFineBin   = (TGraphErrors*) hAsymUniProfile->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grAsymUniProfileFineBin");
00730 
00731    Double_t maxCarbonRate = fhIntensProfile->GetMaximum();
00732 
00733    for (Int_t ib=1; ib<=fhIntensProfile->GetNbinsX(); ib++)
00734    {
00735       float intens    = fhIntensProfile->GetBinContent(ib)/maxCarbonRate;
00736 
00737       if (intens <= 0) continue;
00738 
00739       float intensErr = fhIntensProfile->GetBinError(ib)/maxCarbonRate;
00740       float asym      = hAsymVsDelim4Det->GetBinContent(ib);
00741       float asymErr   = hAsymVsDelim4Det->GetBinError(ib);
00742 
00743       float xuni_p =    TMath::Sqrt(-2*TMath::Log(intens));
00744       float xuni_m = -1*TMath::Sqrt(-2*TMath::Log(intens));
00745 
00746       grIntensUniProfileFineBin->SetPoint( (ib-1)*2 + 0, xuni_p, intens);
00747       grIntensUniProfileFineBin->SetPoint( (ib-1)*2 + 1, xuni_m, intens);
00748       grIntensUniProfileFineBin->SetPointError( (ib-1)*2 + 0, 0, intensErr);
00749       grIntensUniProfileFineBin->SetPointError( (ib-1)*2 + 1, 0, intensErr);
00750 
00751       grAsymUniProfileFineBin->SetPoint( (ib-1)*2 + 0, xuni_p, asym);
00752       grAsymUniProfileFineBin->SetPoint( (ib-1)*2 + 1, xuni_m, asym);
00753       grAsymUniProfileFineBin->SetPointError( (ib-1)*2 + 0, 0, asymErr);
00754       grAsymUniProfileFineBin->SetPointError( (ib-1)*2 + 1, 0, asymErr);
00755    }
00756 
00757    Info("PostFill", "fitting test");
00758 
00759    TF1 myGaus("myGaus", "[0]*TMath::Gaus(x, [1], [2])", -3, 3);
00760    myGaus.SetParNames("Constant", "Mean", "Sigma");
00761    myGaus.SetParameters(0.5, 0, 1);
00762    myGaus.SetParLimits(0, 0, 100);
00763    myGaus.FixParameter(1, 0); // fix mean at 0 by definition
00764    myGaus.SetParLimits(2, 0, 100);
00765 
00766    grAsymUniProfileFineBin->Fit(&myGaus, "M E R");
00767 
00768    // reset parameters and fit another graph
00769    myGaus.SetParameters(0.5, 0, 1);
00770    myGaus.SetParLimits(0, 0, 100);
00771    myGaus.FixParameter(1, 0); // fix mean at 0 by definition
00772    myGaus.SetParLimits(2, 0, 100);
00773    grIntensUniProfileFineBin->Fit(&myGaus, "M E R");
00774 
00775 
00776    TH1 *hAsymUniProfileBin = (TH1*) o["hAsymUniProfileBin"];
00777    utils::BinGraph(grAsymUniProfileFineBin, hAsymUniProfileBin);
00778 
00779    // Fill hist from graph
00780    TH1* hIntensUniProfileBin     = (TH1*) o["hIntensUniProfileBin"];
00781    TH1* hPolarUniProfileBin      = (TH1*) o["hPolarUniProfileBin"];
00782    TH1* hPolarVsIntensProfileBin = (TH1*) o["hPolarVsIntensProfileBin"];
00783    TH1* hPolarVsIntensProfileLargeBins =(TH1*) o["hPolarVsIntensProfileLargeBins"];
00784 
00785    utils::BinGraph(grIntensUniProfile,     hIntensUniProfileBin);
00786    utils::BinGraph(grPolarUniProfile,      hPolarUniProfileBin);
00787    utils::BinGraph(grPolarVsIntensProfile, hPolarVsIntensProfileBin);
00788    utils::BinGraph(grPolarVsIntensProfile, hPolarVsIntensProfileLargeBins);
00789 
00790    hIntensUniProfileBin->Fit("gaus", "M E");
00791    hPolarUniProfileBin->Fit("gaus", "M E", "", -3, 3);
00792 
00793    mfPow.SetRange(0.10, 1);
00794    mfPow.SetLineColor(kBlue);
00795 
00796    hPolarVsIntensProfileBin->Fit(&mfPow, "M E R");
00797    hPolarVsIntensProfileLargeBins->Fit(&mfPow, "M E R");
00798    TGraphErrors *grAsymVsIntensProfile = (TGraphErrors*) fhAsymVsIntensProfile->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grAsymVsIntensProfile");
00799    fitres = grAsymVsIntensProfile->Fit(&mfPow, "M E R S");
00800 
00801    //if (fitres.Get()) {
00802    //   gAnaMeasResult->fFitResProfileAsymVsI = fitres;
00803    //} else {
00804    //   Error("PostFill", "Something is wrong with asym profile fit");
00805    //}
00806 
00807 
00808    // Set measurement type
00809    if (gMeasInfo->GetMeasType() == kMEASTYPE_UNKNOWN)
00810       gMeasInfo->SetMeasType( GuessMeasurementType() );
00811 }
00812 
00813 
00815 EMeasType CnipolProfileHists::GuessMeasurementType()
00816 {
00817    if (!fhIntensProfile) {
00818       Error("GuessMeasurementType", "Histogram (hIntensProfile) not defined");
00819       return kMEASTYPE_UNKNOWN;
00820    }
00821 
00822    Double_t ymax = fhIntensProfile->GetMaximum();
00823 
00824    if (ymax > 0) fhIntensProfile->Scale(1./ymax);
00825    else
00826       Error("GuessMeasurementType", "Empty histogram (hIntensProfile) ?");
00827 
00828    TH1F *hIntensProj = new TH1F("hIntensProj", "hIntensProj", 20, 0, 1);
00829 
00830    utils::ConvertToProfile(fhIntensProfile, hIntensProj, kFALSE);
00831 
00832    Int_t nSteps = fhIntensProfile->GetNbinsX();
00833 
00834    // start from the second bin (0.05 - 0.10 intensity) since we don't care
00835    // about small intensity steps
00836    for (Int_t i=2; i<=hIntensProj->GetNbinsX(); i++) {
00837       //if (nTotal)
00838       //printf("proj: %f, %d\n", hIntensProj->GetBinContent(i), nSteps);
00839       if (hIntensProj->GetBinContent(i) >= 0.5*nSteps)
00840          return kMEASTYPE_FIXED;
00841    }
00842 
00843    return kMEASTYPE_SWEEP;
00844 }
00845 
00846 
00848 Double_t CnipolProfileHists::ProfileFitFunc(Double_t *x, Double_t *par)
00849 {
00850    Double_t time = x[0];
00851    Double_t sigma = par[0];
00852    Double_t mean1 = par[1];
00853    Double_t mean2 = par[2];
00854    Double_t norm  = par[3];
00855 
00856    Double_t g1 = norm*TMath::Gaus(time, mean1, sigma);
00857    Double_t g2 = norm*TMath::Gaus(time, mean2, sigma);
00858 
00859    return g1 + g2;
00860 }
00861 
00862 
00864 Double_t CnipolProfileHists::ProfileTailFitFunc(Double_t *x, Double_t *par)
00865 {
00866    Double_t time = x[0];
00867 
00868    Int_t    iBin    = fhIntensProfile->FindBin(time);
00869    Double_t crbRate = fhIntensProfile->GetBinContent(iBin);
00870 
00871    if (crbRate > 0.50) {
00872       TF1::RejectPoint();
00873       return 0;
00874    }
00875 
00876    return ProfileFitFunc(x, par);
00877 }
